## EthersConnectionOptionalParams.useStore property

Create a [SfStablecoinStore](./lib-base.sfstablecoinstore.md) and expose it as the `store` property.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly useStore?: EthersSfStablecoinStoreOption;
```

## Remarks

When set to one of the available [options](./lib-ethers.etherssfstablecoinstoreoption.md)<!-- -->, [ReadableEthers.connect()](./lib-ethers.readableethers.connect_1.md) will return a [ReadableEthersWithStore](./lib-ethers.readableetherswithstore.md)<!-- -->, while [EthersSfStablecoin.connect()](./lib-ethers.etherssfstablecoin.connect_1.md) will return an [EthersSfStablecoinWithStore](./lib-ethers.etherssfstablecoinwithstore.md)<!-- -->.

Note that the store won't start monitoring the blockchain until its [start()](./lib-base.sfstablecoinstore.start.md) function is called.
